com.javax0.aptools

Class There

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javax0.aptools.There

  • public class There
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to check object and string existence.

    • Method Detail

      • is

        public static boolean is(java.lang.Object[] o)
        Checks that the object array exists.
        Parameters:
        o - the object array
        Returns:
        true if the array is not null and has at least one element.

      • are

        public static boolean are(java.lang.Object[] o)
        This method is same as is(Object[]). This is complimentary method to make a call more readable when the argument is a variable or an expression that can be read plural e.g.: There.is(strings) is less readable than There.are(strings).

      • is

        public static boolean is(java.lang.String s)
        Checks that the string exists
        Parameters:
        s - is the string to check
        Returns:
        true if the string is not null and is not zero length

      • is

        public static boolean is(java.lang.Object s)
        Checks that the object exists.
        Parameters:
        s - the object
        Returns:
        true if the object is not null
